sentences.sContent: Pick a few leaves from the common lawn weed plantain, wash them, mash them, and apply as a poultice to the affected skin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pick a few leaves from the common lawn weed plantain, wash them, mash them, and apply as a poultice to the affected skin.
sentences.sCn: 从常见的草坪杂草车前草上摘几片叶子，洗净，捣碎，然后像膏药一样敷在受感染的皮肤上。

trans.tranOther: a mixture of  malt  or crushed grain and hot water, used to make beer or  whisky
